com.scvngr.levelup.core.net

Class LevelUpRequestWithCurrentUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.AbstractRequest
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.LevelUpRequest
        • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.LevelUpRequestWithCurrentUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class LevelUpRequestWithCurrentUser
extends LevelUpRequest
    LevelUpRequest subclass that formats the ID of the current User into the request URL at request time.
